title: Kiss of Death
description: A tale of forbidden love that could mean life or death.
quote: Even though you’re dead, you’ll always live in my heart.
altHero: a woman leans in to smooch a skeleton
alt1: a cloaked man with glowing red eyes rides a motorcycle in a cemetery
alt2: woman yells and points at the man
alt3: woman cries as she holds a skeleton’s hand to her face
alt4: skeleton removes his coat as the woman shivers nearby
